a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Global number of reported Guinea worm cases, World
Source: The Carter Center (2016), World Health Organisation (2018)
Note: For the early period especially the number of reported cases is much lower than the true number of cases. Greenaway (2004) reports an
estimate of 3.5 million cases for the year 1986.
